email

This website is hosted by Github Pages. This means that all the sources files are open (as in open-source) in a Github repository and that you, as a reader, can contribute to the content. All you need to do is to send a pull request.

  1. Akash Anand, Joshua Small, Dimitrios Peroulis, and Xiaoguang Liu, Theory and Design of Octave Tunable Filters with Lumped Tuning Elements IEEE Transactions on Microwave Theory and Techniques, Dec., 2013.
  2. Akash Anand, and Xiaoguang Liu, Substrate-Integrated Coaxial-Cavity Filter With Tunable Center Frequency and Reconfigurable Bandwidth , Jun., 2014.
  3. Joshua Small, Adam Fruehling, Anurag Garg, Xiaoguang Liu, and Dimitrios Peroulis, Real-time DC-dynamic biasing method for switching time improvement in severely underdamped fringing-field electrostatic MEMS actuators Journal of Visualized Experiments, Aug., 2014.
